articles.description: The device designed by researchers at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) is inexpensive, small, thin and flexible like a sheet of plastic.
articles.content: Los Angeles: Scientists have designed a first-of-its-kind 3D-printed device that can produce electricity from falling snow. The device designed by researchers at the University of California, Los Ang… [+2894 chars]

articles.title: ‘Terrible thing, India’s ASAT satellite test created 400 pieces of debris’: NASA - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As a result of the Indian test, the risk of collision with the ISS has increased by 44 percent over 10 days, Bridenstine said.

articles.title: ISRO’s ‘lost’ Chandrayaan-1 spotted orbiting moon by NASA’s interplanetary radar - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India’s first lunar mission -- the Chandrayaan-1 spacecraft, which was generally considered lost -- is still orbiting the Moon, NASA scientists have found with new technological application of interplanetary radar.
